description:
Make DesktopRootWindowHostWin::GetBounds use client or window rect to match the logic in HWNDMessageHandler::ClientAreaSizeChanged(). Otherwise, Compositor::SetScaleAndSize gets set initially with the browser frame's size that's off by 1 pixel vertically. It never gets updated because the window_pos flag passed to HWNDMessageHandler::OnWindowPosChanged never reflects a client rect change.

Note this only shows up if glass isn't used. For glass, we need another fix in window_snapshot_aura.cc because then the compositor's size is smaller than the window bounds.

This fixes PolicyTest.DisableScreenshotsFeedback on win aura.
Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=168290

messages.text: updated with a fix for when using glass (patchset 4)
